verses.text:
Lift Him up, 'tis He that bids you, let the dying look and live;
To all weary, thirsting sinners, living waters will He give.

Lift Him up, this precious Savior, let the multitude behold;
They with willing hearts shall seek Him, He will draw them to His fold.

Lift Him up in all His glory, 'tis the Son of God on high;
Lift Him up, His glorious Redeemer, all the sins of men did bear.

O then lift Him up in singing, lift the Savior up in prayer;
He, the glorious Redeemer, all the sins of men did bear.
